item.title: Starting My Blog Journey in 2025: Building a Second Brain and Sharing What I Learn
item.description:
Introduction

After watching an inspiring video about starting a blog in 2024, I realized something profound: “my mind is for having ideas, not holding them.” This quote from Tiago Forte’s “Building a Second Brain” hit me hard. We’re drowning in information but starving for wisdom. That’s why I decided to start this blogâ€”not just as another voice on the internet, but as a way to process, organize, and share my journey of learning and growth.
